bill.summary: 9/14/1995--Introduced. Public Housing Safety Act of 1995 - Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to: (1) expand public housing expedited eviction procedures (existing procedures apply to certain criminal activities); (2) require evictions for felony convictions; and (3) make law enforcement records available under specified circumstances for screening and eviction purposes.
